scripts.prep: typings install && mkdir -p dist && cat node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js node_modules/jqueryui/jquery-ui.min.js node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js node_modules/d3/d3.min.js lib/tag-it.min.js node_modules/seedrandom/seedrandom.min.js > dist/lib.js && cp pg1342-tokenized.txt dist/ && cp -r lib/images dist/
scripts.watch-css: node node_modules/catw/bin/cmd.js lib/jquery-ui.min.css node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css lib/jquery.tagit.css lamvi.css -o dist/bundle.css
scripts.build: npm run prep && npm run build-js && npm run build-css && npm run build-html
scripts.watch: npm run prep & npm run watch-js & npm run watch-css & npm run watch-html
